title: Development of Secondary Mathematics Teaching Methods Using a Digital Learning Design Collaboration Network

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital device usage skills and understanding of foundational secondary-level mathematics concepts
context.additional_context: Strengthening digital learning design competencies through collective autobiographical approaches in smartphone-centric constrained technical environments.

learning_goals: Learners can produce three or more types of digital learning materials using a smartphone-based LMS.
Learners can generate five or more ideas for improving secondary mathematics teaching methods through collaboration with peer educators.
Learners can complete one digital portfolio reflecting their teaching experiences.

resources: Digital Content Creation Tools (e.g., Canva, Google Docs)
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
